product_name: Sugoi RPM Sleeveless Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Sugoi RPM Sleeveless bike jersey for women supplies cooling ventilation to combat summer heat when you're riding hard on a two-wheeled adventure. FinoTech polyester fabric features smooth texture, enhanced stretch and swift moisture dispersal-great for high-energy activities. FinoMesh polyester panels under arms and down along sides provide excellent breathability and rapid moisture dispersal. Full front zipper allows enhanced ventilation. With a slanted opening for easy entry, an elasticized rear pocket expands to store cycling essentials and food. Soft and non-chafing flat seams rest easy against the skin. The Sugoi RPM Sleeveless bike jersey features a traditional collar with classic stand-up neck band. Closeout.
short_description: The Sugoi RPM Sleeveless bike jersey for women supplies cooling ventilation to combat summer heat when you're riding hard on a two-wheeled adventure.
